name: CLIMBAAA
description:
Small game for the weekly game jam(week 146)!

You must get out of the pit to the goal! Look out for your oxygen level, because high in the mountains oxygen is quite scarce! Bottled Oxygen will partly refill your oxygen tank!

Controls : Move left - a, Move Right - d,  Jump - Space(The longer you hold down space the longer you jump!)

Credits :

robertgamer250 - Art, Programming

R Menta - Music

Midori Matcha - Helper

Note : due to some unexpected events we couldn't polish the game and had to cut corners on a quite a few things! You can only replay the game if you reload page and currently the game doesn't support arrow controls! You will have to mute your sound if you want to turn off the music. We are very sorry!

Oh and the down right corner of the window says muffin climber, the explanination for that is quite a long story...

Thanks for checking out our game!
